nodes.text: The 1125 Heads-Up Macrobinoculars were a model of macrobinoculars widely used by the Alliance Special Forces. Made handsfree, the 1125 was designed to be strapped to the head, and was capable of offering information on range, azimuth, and elevation. It also had a light-enhancing feature, which was capable of automatically enhancing twilight or night time conditions to seem like daylight. The 1125 was also capable of a a maximum zoom of 1,000 meters.
